titleStmt.title: A. J. Ogilvie et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5461

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To his Excellency Thos. E. Bramlett Gov.. of Kentucky we the undersigned we are aquainted with the facts and Circumstances Establish her on trial of G. G. Tatman conviction in the McCracken circuit court of Manslaughter we believe said Tatman guilty of the of the Killing of Heady and Respectfully but Earnestly remonstrate against your Excellency of pardoning him

L. Wood
Jos. G. Mansfield
G. R. Kelly
J S. Tomlinson
A. J. Ogilvie
T. W. Speir
W H Ogilvie
James Wilkins
J. S. Crawford
A W Carrady
J. J. Crawford
W. g. Crawford
C P Matlock
C c Averett
J B Baker
L. W.. Parker
A T Miers
T miers
Wm Hase
C E Bradley
T H Flours
W. R. Peal
C G Royster
S C Vaughan
E... W. Woodson
H Angler
C B Bunnles
S. Y. Haselwood
